short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Refresh your inbox and load new emails from your POP3 accounts in Gmail automatically. Every Minute and when you go to Inbox

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Refresh your inbox and load new emails from your POP3 accounts in Gmail automatically. The extension will refresh your inbox and load emails from your POP3 accounts every minute and also every time you go to inbox, so you stay synced with your other POP3 accounts.
